https://tmrev.io/movie/112195-Dragon Hunter 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/Amja10QXwmQG6AkGLr8jygUl3P2.jpg Gorka has long postponed again and again the answer to the pressing questions that his son Aitor asks about his past. Gorka, a member of ETA political-military until its dissolution in the early eighties, ends joining the guerrillas in Central America. A life experience shared with Maddalen, a nurse and committed Christian, with José, an indigenous guerrilla member, and Andrés a former military, head of the insurrection. An experience that will transform them all. Dragon Hunter
